title: Earth-Like Planet Found Orbiting Distant Star, But There's A Major Catch

title: Why Mira Murati Quit As Chief Technology Officer Of OpenAI
content: Mira Murati quit as the Chief Technology Officer of OpenAI on Wednesday. She's the latest to join a growing list of high-profile exits from the company. Ms Murati's decision comes after 6 years with the artificial intelligence pioneer behind ChatGPT.
summary: Mira Murati quit as the Chief Technology Officer of OpenAI on Wednesday. She's the latest to join a growing list of high-profile exits from the company. Ms Murati's decision comes after 6 years with the artificial intelligence pioneer behind ChatGPT.

title: Japan's Longest-Serving Death Row Inmate Now A Free Man
content: A Japanese court on Thursday acquitted Iwao Hakamada, the world's longest-serving death row prisoner, closing a nearly six decades-long chapter.
summary: A Japanese court on Thursday acquitted Iwao Hakamada, the world's longest-serving death row prisoner, closing a nearly six decades-long chapter.

title: Author Jhumpa Lahiri Declines Award Over New York Museum's Keffiyeh Ban
content: Pulitzer Prize winning author Jhumpa Lahiri declined to accept an award from New York City's Noguchi Museum after it fired three employees for wearing keffiyeh head scarves, an emblem of Palestinian solidarity, following an updated dress code.
summary: Pulitzer Prize winning author Jhumpa Lahiri declined to accept an award from New York City's Noguchi Museum after it fired three employees for wearing keffiyeh head scarves, an emblem of Palestinian solidarity, following an updated dress code.

title: 4 Arrested After 'Suicide Pod' Is Used For First Time In Switzerland

title: Temple Defaced With Anti-Hindu Graffiti In US, Second Time In 8 Days

title: Pics: World's First 3D-Printed Hotel Takes Shape In Texas
content: El Cosmico, an existing hotel and campground on the outskirts of the city of Marfa, is building 43 new hotel units and 18 residential homes over 40 acres - all with a 3D printer.
